00037 #include "egs_shape_collection.h"
00038 #include "egs_input.h"
00039 #include "egs_functions.h"
00040 
00041 EGS_ShapeCollection::EGS_ShapeCollection(const vector<EGS_BaseShape *> &Shapes,
00042         const vector<EGS_Float> &Probs, const string &Name, EGS_ObjectFactory *f) :
00043     EGS_BaseShape(Name,f), nshape(0) {
00044     int n1 = Shapes.size(), n2 = Probs.size();
00045     if (n1 < 2 || n2 < 2 || n1 != n2) {
00046         egsWarning("EGS_ShapeCollection::EGS_ShapeCollection: invalid input\n");
00047         return;
00048     }
00049     nshape = n1;
00050     shapes = new EGS_BaseShape* [nshape];
00051     EGS_Float *dum = new EGS_Float [nshape], *p = new EGS_Float [nshape];
00052     for (int j=0; j<nshape; j++) {
00053         shapes[j] = Shapes[j];
00054         shapes[j]->ref();
00055         p[j] = Probs[j];
00056         dum[j] = 1;
00057     }
00058     table = new EGS_AliasTable(nshape,dum,p,0);
00059     delete [] dum;
00060     delete [] p;
00061 }
00062 
00063 extern "C" {
00064 
00065     EGS_SHAPE_COLLECTION_EXPORT EGS_BaseShape *createShape(EGS_Input *input,
00066             EGS_ObjectFactory *f) {
00067         if (!input) {
00068             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): null input?\n");
00069             return 0;
00070         }
00071         vector<EGS_BaseShape *> shapes;
00072         vector<EGS_Float> probs;
00073         EGS_Input *ishape;
00074         while ((ishape = input->takeInputItem("shape",false))) {
00075             EGS_BaseShape *shape = EGS_BaseShape::createShape(ishape);
00076             if (!shape) {
00077                 egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): got null shape\n");
00078             }
00079             else {
00080                 shapes.push_back(shape);
00081             }
00082             delete ishape;
00083         }
00084         vector<string> snames;
00085         int err = input->getInput("shape names",snames);
00086         if (!err && snames.size() > 0) {
00087             for (unsigned int j=0; j<snames.size(); j++) {
00088                 EGS_BaseShape *shape = EGS_BaseShape::getShape(snames[j]);
00089                 if (!shape) egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): no shape "
00090                                            "named %s exists\n",snames[j].c_str());
00091                 else {
00092                     shapes.push_back(shape);
00093                 }
00094             }
00095         }
00096         err = input->getInput("probabilities",probs);
00097         bool ok = true;
00098         if (err) {
00099             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): no 'probabilities' input\n");
00100             ok = false;
00101         }
00102         if (shapes.size() < 2) {
00103             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): at least 2 shapes are "
00104                        "needed for a shape collection, you defined %s\n",shapes.size());
00105             ok = false;
00106         }
00107         if (shapes.size() != probs.size()) {
00108             egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): the number of shapes (%d)"
00109                        " is not the same as the number of input probabilities (%d)\n");
00110             ok = false;
00111         }
00112         for (unsigned int i=0; i<probs.size(); i++) {
00113             if (probs[i] < 0) {
00114                 egsWarning("createShape(shape collection): probabilities must not"
00115                            " be negative, but your input probability %d is %g\n",
00116                            i,probs[i]);
00117                 ok = false;
00118             }
00119         }
00120         if (!ok) {
00121             for (unsigned int j=0; j<shapes.size(); j++) {
00122                 EGS_Object::deleteObject(shapes[j]);
00123             }
00124             return 0;
00125         }
00126         EGS_ShapeCollection *s = new EGS_ShapeCollection(shapes,probs,"",f);
00127         s->setName(input);
00128         s->setTransformation(input);
00129         return s;
00130     }
00131 
00132 }
